# Exercice 4

Let $X = (X_1, X_2)$ follow the distribution 

## 1


```{r}
library(mvtnorm)

f_gauss_vect <- function(n,mu,Sig) {
  return(rmvnorm(n, mean = mu, sigma = Sig))
}
```

## 2

```{r}
n <- 10000
mu <- c(1,2)
Sig <- matrix(c(4,3,3,9), nrow = 2)

X <- f_gauss_vect(n,mu,Sig)
x <- seq(-10,10,0.1)

Y <- X[,1] + X[,2]

Z <- rnorm(n, mean = 3, sd = sqrt(19))

par(mfrow = c(1,2))

hist(Y,freq = F)
lines(density(Y), col = "blue")
curve(dnorm(x, mean = 3, sd = sqrt(19)), add = T, col = "red")

qqplot(X,Z,main = "QQ-Plot between real N(3,19) and estimated one")
```
